duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage the physical security team to ensure the safety of the museum, staff, and visitors.
Oversee the implementation of the Security department strategic plan to safeguard the Museum's physical properties and art.
Manage the fire life safety program and safety and health programs, including compliance assurance and incident investigation.
Monitor and maintain compliance with federal and state OSHA requirements and applicable consensus standards.
Project management of crisis management, threat detection, and vendor management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Security Management, Business Administration, or a related field (FLSD certification required)
